reviews.text: This station is rated 5 stars because i like i this station this why?

Staff very friendly and helpful they maintain the station to a high standard always clean. The train service from here into London is generally good but at weekends in particular can be frustrating as engineering works adds 20 mins journey time.
If it wasn't for the traffic it would be best spot for miles around.

Quite overrated town nowadays, with more and more "chavs" moving in, whilst remaining expensive. The old local businesses are struggling, and most newly launched ones go bust quickly. 
The public transport is a shambles, like in all East Hertfordshire.
It saw no significant services development for years! 
It's screaming out "provincial", and the general impression is, sadly, one of a rather backwards place.
Ware is a lovely town in Hertfordshire made  famous for its Malting industry.
